column2: confirming England's advancement to the quarterfinals of the World Cup! The Three Lions started the second half as strongly as they ended the first
column3: with Saka scoring their third goal within 12 minutes of the restart. England then kept Senegal at bay
column4: almost adding to their lead multiple times and only allowing them a few shots on goal as they secured a 3-0 win
column5: setting up an exciting matchup with France in the next round.
